website_summaries.verdict: The re-creation of the Keds Champion into a laceless structure that allows the feet to slide in effortlessly gives this version another dimension that almost every woman should be happy about. Avid followers of this reliable brand have raised concerns on sizing as it tends to be quite narrower than earlier versions, while the opening appears to be tight for some. However, an adequate break-in period can remedy those setbacks.
pros: The Keds Champion Slip-On has a breathable canvas upper that makes it an ideal choice for summer
It is among the Keds sneakers with high-quality material, according to several reviewers
Many adore the convenience of its slip-on format plus it comes lightweight too
A lot of reviewers say that the narrow build of this sneaker hugs the foot comfortably
The Keds Champion Slip-On is constructed using durable materials and assembled to last for a long time, as a couple of users have imparted
Keds has kept the quality of its Champion shoe that a lot of buyers are endorsing this sneaker to their friends and colleagues
It has decent arch support, as per a few reviewers who have also admitted to being flat-footed
A cheaper alternative to Vans Slip-On that’s also durable and comfy, according to a handful
cons: The darker canvas tones show dust and dirt marks easily, as per some users
Some would have loved it if this shoe was offered in slim format too
It can be tight and stiff at the top that it needs ample break-in time, according to a couple of buyers

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Sneaks
customer_reviews.text: I love these classic slip-on Keds! They fit like a glove and can be worn with anything casual. They look super cute with summer dresses. You can put them in the washer, and they come out white and don’t fall apart. I usually wear them without socks, and they’re very comfortable. I’ve got very sensitive feet due to an illness, and even though they don’t have much arch support, I don’t get sore feet. Definitely worth the little extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: MZbeeLover

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were definitely worth it. I am a male that likes to wear Keds. These shoes are so comfortable and feel so good to walk in. Not too tight and just the right look. Been buying Keds since 2000 and I have lost count on how many pairs I've had of these slip on Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A tad tight to begin with but quickly felt great
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box it was in the afternoon and they felt really tight. But I thought it is the afternoon so wait til tomorrow to try them on. I'm glad I did. They were still just a tad tight but the more I wore them (without socks) the better they felt. They are just about perfect. One thing though is the soles seem to be a little slippery. I was in the restroom at church and there were a few drops of water on the floor and it was like the whole floor was wet. But I still love them and would order another pair same size again.
customer_reviews.author: Jjarman

customer_reviews.title: Love them but a few comments
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a 6W because I have wide feet and my usual size is 6 -- they came as expected and was pleased with the look but the 6 was too large in length. I could push on my big toe and it would indent into blank space. I sent it back and re-ordered a 5.5W. Again came as expected. The length fit just right but the width was a tad narrower than the 6W. It doesn't pinch or hurt on the width but I wish they would have kept the same width as the 6W. Either way I'm ok with the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is all wrong (way too small) Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: These Keds slip on sneakers are horrible. Made cheaply. My guess is they are made in China. I purchased my normal size 7 & could barely squeeze into them. I'm a tiny framed female who has always worn a 6.5 or 7 shoe/ sneaker. I tossed them in the trash 15 minutes after trying to squeeze into them. These are not standard quality! Disappointed with Keds because I've always had a pair of these to slip into
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.

customer_reviews.title: Great and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I had an injury and am no longer able to use shoes that tie with shoe laces. I had a pair of lace-up Keds that I used for walking on the beach and was looking for something lightweight but sturdy enough. These shoes are perfect for my needs. They fit well and are not as heavy as traditional athletic shoes. If you do a lot of walking or running, this is probably not the right shoe. However, they are easy to pack and great for a walks on the beach - and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: GreatLady

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have BIG, WIDE feet and these are actually too loose. I kept them because it just wasn't worth the hassle of returning them. If I bought them again I wouldn't bother getting the wide as it is like double wide. I'm not kidding, I have the widest woman's foot I've ever seen and my feet swim in these. I took care of some of the looseness by using shoe inserts to give more support.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Clucker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wash in a machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Got them and loved them! Then got them dirty. Washed them in HE machine and air dried them and they haven’t been the same since! They lost almost all their stiffness and it looks like my toes stretch them when I wear them. I guess because the canvas is too thin. If I had known washing in a machine would have done that to them, I wouldn’t have done it because they were great at first!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Keds Go with Almost Any Outfit
customer_reviews.text: I love these classic Keds. They literally go with almost any outfit from leggings to jeans to skirts to summer dresses. I ordered the 9W and they do run just a touch large. The width was great and a true wide (not extra wide but just an actual wide compared to M width). I typically wear a 9 or 9.5 and this 9 was plenty roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheer Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe has a very snug sock-less fit which is ok, but the canvas upper is quite stiff. There is very little cushion- I can feel stones right through the sole. I’m used to Sketchers cushioning, so this was a bit of a shock. I was afraid the heel would rub, but that hasn’t been a problem at all. Overall a fun summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shane

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Sides separated. Too late to return
customer_reviews.text: These shoes *were* good, until they weren’t. The sides have started coming away from the shoe and they look awful and now catch water. Too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: FlibbertyGibbit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find sneakers of any sort or brand in a narrow width but Keds still manufactures a couple of styles that fit me and my daughter. As much as we would have liked to buy one of their blinged out styles at least we could purchase these white slip ons and add our own sparkles to give them an up to date younger look. These shoes arrived in perfect condition and quickly. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wilson Bilotta

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Fit & Profile!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect! The shoe has a narrower profile than most womens slip on tennis shoes, which gives it a more feminine look and appeal. They are extremely comfortable and soft. While there is not a tone of support, and you wouldn't expect there to be, give the style of shoe, it's supportive in its own right. You can't beat the price and the history of Keds branding. The only negative comment is I wish there were more colors to choose from with the Champion Canvas Slip on! I love the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to slip on when I sit by the pool. However they are so comfortable I have been wearing them more often.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit great but after two wears the soles came apart. These were a gift for my mom. I have purchased before but I am extremely disappointed in the quality in these especially since they were a gift from my mom. Hopefully they were just a fluke because this is my mom’s favorite brand
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great for any age. My first pair of keds, can you believe it? Too cute not to try. I will say that they run a tiny bit small but I've decided not to go up 1/2 a size as I don't want them to lift in the heel. I'm hoping for a little stretch when they're broken-in.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: You will love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they do not hurt my feet! I wish the same shoe came in other colors.....I would purchase some blue, brown, and black if they did! I have purchased other Keds shoes I thought were similar, but the ankle was too high or the width to narrow. These are wide, and fit my foot and ankle best.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So sad I loved these shoes the first couple weeks I had them. Then they turned YELLOW! And as they sit they’re getting yellower. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kaybea

customer_reviews.title: so of course they're comfortable. I actually bought two pairs because I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 21 year old female, just to provide some perspective. They're keds, so of course they're comfortable. I actually bought two pairs because I wanted to put my artwork on them for my sister and myself. They're a cheaper alternative to vans slip-ons while still being durable and comfortable. They worked just as well for artwork too. What I find with keds is that they're always just a tad narrow, but after some wear and breaking them in, they widen up just enough. I bought them during christmas and it's august now, so they've held up pretty well considering how poorly I treat my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you want to go sockless
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits great and are mostly quite comfortable. But the heel is very stiff and cut quite large sores into my heels the first time wearing these without socks. I am trying to break them in, but it still rubs. Just be warned if you are prone to getting blisters from shoes.
customer_reviews.author: oneyf

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for 40 or more years. The last two pair I have bought are impossible. Too narrow, hurt my feet something terrible. I'm so disappointed. I never expected Keds would find a way to ruin these, but they have.
customer_reviews.author: cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Cute fit
customer_reviews.text: It a narrow fit... If you have straight flat feet it's a winner...clean white looking...simple... I wear a 9 and 8.5... I kinda struggled to get it on... Wasn't too bad though... Might stretch...
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: White Keds are very cool.
customer_reviews.text: These Keds meet all my expectations. I haven't had a pair for some time and felt nostalgic. They are comfortable and perfect for summer, though I will wear them all year. More support than Toms. Look good with everything.
customer_reviews.author: JayeS

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the fit Was just right. The memory Foam makes it even more Comfortable to walk around with them. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE.  SEVERAL SIZES SMALLER THAN LISTED
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaay Toooo Small. 7m and couldnt even get foot in them Probably order 2 times larger -Seriously, at least., better yet DONT ORDER AT ALL. Really sad, cause they were sent to friend for custom paint-job for Christmas. Recipients husband read all her shoes she owns as a 7M and these? After allllll that work for a suprise Christmas -are now WORTHLESS due to their crappy sizing. DO NOT EVER BUY Wrong wrong wrong. Suckedforchristmas
customer_reviews.author: Rollo C Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great slip ons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my mother. She is a diabetic and has to wear slip on shoes. We bought the 11 wide even though she only wears a 10. They are big on her but she can easily slip them on. I do not not think they are that wide for being advertised as a wide.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow at the toes.
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow to your toes. My foot is average. Definitely not for me. I use them a slip on’s now or for the ocean. I don’t feel that they were good value at all for me
customer_reviews.author: MCGStephanie

customer_reviews.title: Simple, comfortable and go with anything.
customer_reviews.text: I still love less, they are simple, comfortable and go with pretty much anything. My usual "negative" input is that they are not the easiest to clean, like most canvas shoes. Don't put them in the washer because they'll turn yellow when they dry. I learned my lesson the hard way with another pair and scrubbed this pair with a toothbrush with a paste made of baking soda and hydrogen peroxide. Overall, a favorite shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: These were nice shoes. I am trying to find my size due to new foot issues. I have been trying different sizes to find what will fit me. I have to use orthotics and I'm looking for shoes that have some footbed support that I can wear without using the orthotics in them. I am looking for "cute" shoes to wear for a short time to dinner etc. These were too large, but cute without support. I sent them back and reordered a smaller size that had some footbed support.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Dodd

customer_reviews.title: TOO WIDE
customer_reviews.text: My feet are long and somewhat narrow. Therefore, I have a difficult time finding good fitting shoes. I have purchased Keds 13 M (medium) in the past and thought this would work. However, those shoes previously purchased were lace up sneakers. Apparently, the Keds slip on sneaker's width are slightly different. I probably need a 13 N (narrow) but that was not available so I am having to exchange for a 13 S (slim). I have not received the shoe as of yet so I do not know if the slim will be too narrow. If it is, I will have to return the shoe completely and request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: My new Summer go-to shoes
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt find these canvas slip-ons in any store but found them on Amazon. I could still be driving around endlessly instead of enjoying these Summer slip-on sneakers. Comfortable, supporting, washable, breathable material. I'm all smiles.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Klyber

customer_reviews.title: Need socks for extended wear
customer_reviews.text: Loved them when I got them and they were pretty comfy all day but by the end of day feeling a littke more on the sides o took them off and coukd barely walk! Blisters on the bottom of my feet. Good shoes but have to wear socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these shoes and swear by the brand. The only thing is they gave me blisters which makes it hard to actually wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Habermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tapered fit. Looks great with shorts, pants, and dresses. And they feel so good on!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimble

customer_reviews.title: NARROW
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these shoes are narrow. I have narrow feet so I wasn't expecting it to be a problem. I needed to stretch them out around the house for a few days first.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: My mom has been wearing the same shoes for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother who has been wearing the same shoes for years. It is hard to find tennis shoes and a narrow width - thank you kids for making these.
customer_reviews.author: Libbi Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get wide. Regular is for narrow foot.
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange for wide size. Regular size was for a narrow foot and was too tight. Wide fit perfect and they have been my favorite tennis shoe to wear. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love them and was worried about them being too narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them and was worried about them being too narrow but they are actually a little too big, but perfect for running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Melanee HT

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/Easy off😀
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a shoe that I didn’t have to lace up. Easy on, Easy off. Fits my foot just right! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: julescali

customer_reviews.title: Keds changed the look
customer_reviews.text: These keds are not like what I remember. The toe is long. The whole shoe is different. If it ain't broke don't fix it. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. Love these! A bit nicer looking rather than wearing just sneakers, but just as comfortable
customer_reviews.author: c.p.m.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment awaits.
customer_reviews.text: Not Ked quality I am used to. Very thin canvas and no Scotchguard so any stains are there for good, cannot be washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Keds Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with true Keds quality I love these slip on sneakers for the summer. Great price! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sexton

customer_reviews.title: These fit nicely. My feet can swell by the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit nicely. My feet can swell by the end of the day, making sizing difficult but these are great. The elastic helps in the morning to keep it snug but not at all uncomfortable. Haven’t had them long enough to judge wear, but they seem sturdy yet very comfy-casual. Easy to slip on and off. Very bright white, but I plan on decorating them with fabric markers.
customer_reviews.author: 4UIreview

customer_reviews.title: Okay fit
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight, they fit well just a bit tight a bigger size wouldn’t be good! Wearable
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Supper summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to wear. It is fantastic they come narrow or I would not be able to purchase them as my foot is very narrow. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: The Narrow is VERY Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The narrow is VERY narrow. I don't know if these are cut differently than my last pair, but these are the same sixze (8.5N) and they are quite SNUG in the width. I can't wear them comfortably for more than an hour...
customer_reviews.author: J. Freudenberg

customer_reviews.title: Medium width to narrow
customer_reviews.text: The width has changed dramatically since I last purchased these. My favorite go to’s. Hoping wide will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Debera

customer_reviews.title: It is all because of my pudgy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Keds products are reliable and affordable, unfortunately for me, I have swollen feet 90% of the time. The "tongue" part of this particular shoe was too tight, I could not even get my foot in, so I think for the size, the wide is narrower than other shoe brands. The rating I gave is completely my fault. I rarely can find shoes with the kind of top of the foot coverage that I can fit into. I may have to try a slip on variety with less over the toe coverage, but Keds is a great show brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Keds still exists
customer_reviews.text: Just what you'd expect. I bought a 9w toe area fits well but a little loose on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these . I usually wear a 8 1/2 to a 9 . Ordered the 8 1/2 and they fit perfect . Slim shoe , not for wide foot . Made well .
customer_reviews.author: jen piner

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds, they are a great shoe! These seem to be well made, so hopefully they will last awhile. They seem to run large, at least for me. I bought these for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I love this classic slip-on tennie. Just like I remember!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Adams

customer_reviews.title: fussy Wife knows
customer_reviews.text: My wife is fussy . She thinks this shoe is great. she has bought two so far.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This product fits to size. It is well made and looks great on.
customer_reviews.author: valerie laktash

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: These were way too small and much too narrow. I wound up donating them to charity (because I was too lazy to return them, honestly). I won't buy Keds online again...since you can't trust the size, I would need to try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: More of a mans shoe
customer_reviews.text: Keds Women Champion Canvas Slip on Sneaker, Photo not necessarily actual. While white in color, and keds label on back. Looked like a mans Loafer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susanb79

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I ordered a half size up since I have wide feet and really didn't need to you if you order the wide. I usually wear an 8. I ordered and 8.5 wide. An 8 wide would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jess G.

customer_reviews.title: A summertime classic
customer_reviews.text: A classic--a style that I have been wearing for decades and will for years to come! They work well with everything from shorts to chinos to casual skirts and summer dresses. I said that I could wear them all day, but that is an exaggeration right now. I can wear them 6 hours or so before they start to rub (I don't wear them with socks or footies). A month from now, they will be perfectly broken in and will provide all-day comfort.
customer_reviews.author: N. Carney

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fall apart after washing them. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: WALKING J

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery , website easy to use ..
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with shoes . Fit well &comfortable .. I would order them again ...
customer_reviews.author: betty greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Easily The Best Flats
customer_reviews.text: Literally the most comfortable flats I own. I was terrified to buy these flats because of how uncomfortable other brands are. These Keds are simply amazing. No blisters on the back of my heels at all, breathable and easily go with my outfits. 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Chad

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I almost didn't keep them because I thought I had ordered black. Once I tried them on I loved them. I still want to get a black pair. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Campa

customer_reviews.title: Love these Keds!
customer_reviews.text: Love the traditional fit and style, buy a pair every2 years. This year I gave them a good spray of Scotch Guard.... DO NOT DRY KEDS IN THE DRYER!!!!!! From previous use, sometimes the glue seeps out and yellows on the canvas!!! Love the shoe! BeBe Miller
customer_reviews.author: JustBeBe

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I kind of suspect that these are not authentic Keds. The price was very low, so I kept them. But the fabric was warped...wrinkled....not smooth. Blistered. I've worn them for a while now and just today placed an order elsewhere for another pair. They were more money, but I expect them to be authentic Keds.....and not wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Judy10021

customer_reviews.title: They are bigger than I needed them but they are easy for me to get on
customer_reviews.text: I got the shoes because I was having a hip replacement and I can't bend that leg for 12 weeks,until it is completely healed and I had to have shoes that I could slip on instead of tie shoes. They are bigger than I needed them but they are easy for me to get on. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: k davis

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I reallllly wish I would have gotten the wide ones and I don’t even have big feet at all. I can barely get them on which really bums me out because I want them to be slip ons. But whatever they are still great for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I’m a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find plain white canvas slip-ons for three summers now. Finally, success! They fit well, even though I have the beginnings of an ugly bunion on my left foot. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keds!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved my slip on Keds!! I went a period of time trying to get them in my size, but thankfully through Amazon it was possible again!!!
customer_reviews.author: dkaler2

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and size was perfect! No guessing.. ordered my usual size!
customer_reviews.author: Anet

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: See.....I love the idea of these shoes, and when I say they fit as expected I mean Keds doesn't make shoes in mh size, which is 11.5 or 12. It's been this way my whole life. I wish I was able to buy cute, trendy shoes in fun colors in my size......If Keds made more of their shoes in one size larger for women, I would buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: pollyanna999

customer_reviews.title: Keds!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for MIL for Christmas. She loves these kids and they are very hard to find. Glad I found them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8.5 wide and they were way too big. They were probably a size 9.5 Wide in fit.
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 8, normal not wide. Had to send back for a 8.5 and the middle (by arch) still feels tight. I'm sure it will be better once I break them in
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: As always, Keds doesn’t disappoint. True to size, very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened, but now the medium width in Keds is extremely narrow! Neither I nor my granddaughter could wear them. What a disappointment! It's too much of a hassle to return them, so I guess they will go into the charity box.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Keds are comfortable/can be washed in washer.  Come out white!
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are comfortable - wear them every day - still summer weather & whites in CA.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these in a narrow width. Ordered medium width because my feet sometimes are swollen. They are fine, just a little looser than I thought. No problem. My last pair lasted for nearly 10 years, and survived many washings in the washer. Actually the sole just wore out until it became smooth and slippery. Hope these do as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Smith-Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes! I'm 7 months pregnant and needed a pair of shoes that I could just slip on and not bend over to put on my feet and some that would fit my somewhat swollen feet. These shoes met those needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wide width and they are just right.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe so much I am going to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit snug but after using my shoe stretcher it fits perfectly. Cute! I love my Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mae

customer_reviews.title: Ked's Champion Slip Ons
customer_reviews.text: I work outdoors a lot at a park. These shoes are really comfortable and I can wear them with summer skirts as well as shorts. The only drawback is that they get dirty when I am outside a lot. So I will probably buy them in leather next time. But they were perfect for this summer, and I have certainly gotten my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Almost seems like it's made in some cheap factory somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Canvas is extremely thin. Almost seems like it's made in some cheap factory somewhere. Not like the heavy canvas I've seen in the past
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit of these shoes is very different from other ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit of these shoes is very different from other styles of Keds. The top of the shoe is narrow despite the elastic pieces; it also comes up too high on your foot. The underside of the top piece is scratchy and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: myLady

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super narrow I cannot even put my feet in them
customer_reviews.text: None of my shoes are wide shoes. These shoes are super narrow I cannot even put my feet in them. The delivery avc. for them was perfect timing for an event I wanted to use them for tomorrow. But I can’t. I’m so disappointed with how narrow they are.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Always a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and bought them again and again, until I bought Sketchers, Now I love Sketchers as they give more support and are far more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love my slip on keds
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased at least 10 times. Love this tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenie McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was too small but it was my fault. Reordered
customer_reviews.author: Chris andrews

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but the size 12 was way too big for me. I’ll have to go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Educated, Single & Black American Female

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these shoes in the same size (8.5M) for many years. This particular pair was much more narrow than usual, and I when I compared the soles of the shoes, the new pair was visibly more narrow. Fortunately, Amazon makes returns very easy.
customer_reviews.author: drb3732

customer_reviews.title: Keds slip on
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long to try these on. they were way too large; I had to donate them.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6N shoe and am so grateful to Keds that they make shoes in this size as they are very hard to find in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kernas

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect these to fit but they did. My foot is narrow an they worked. The more I wear them the more I like them. A perfect fit for a narrow foot!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Love (and have always loved) the arch support
customer_reviews.text: They fit fine. No room for Sox but wore them without today and they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, simple, white shoe. Goes with so much in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: A little Small
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for their slip on ability. I did have to send back the first time the snitching was off. they seem to be some what on the small side. I hope they will stretch. I did want to have send back again.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: ... in footwear for years and these shoes are a great example of the Keds quality
customer_reviews.text: Keds has been a trusted name in footwear for years and these shoes are a great example of the Keds quality.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing theses for years ...until they wear c Out totally! Price has gone up !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: I negatives from me!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Keds...easy on and off, they clean up easily with the swipe of a cloth, and they look great..
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit great....
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for red-striped canvas slip ons all summer and when I found the Keds brand on sale through Amazon, I quickly ordered. I wasn't disappointed - right color, great fit and just a fun shoe...would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia D. Raynes

product_meta.title: Keds Men's Champion Original Canvas Slip-On Sneaker, White, 2.5 UK
product_meta.description:
Summery lightweight classic slip on by Keds in the color White. Convincing by pleasant comfort. Small Keds logo on the side ensures the recognition value.

Keds
The rubber sole shoe is made from high quality canvas and leather. The brand, which in the early 20th Century, reached cult status, is now represented in many colorful designs in the shoe closets all over the world. Today Keds are available in a variety of different models that differ in shape and design. Keds convinced in summer with ease and colorful designs, is it winter in the foreground stands that the feet keeps warm. When you buy Keds, you buy a piece of history. But not only in black and white, all rainbow colors are available.



Fitting: Regular
Fitting: Regular
Material: plastic, Canvas
Fit: normal
Care Instructions: Spray before first use
